price: Sie sagten: „Preis sei Dir! Wir haben kein Wissen außer dem, was Du uns gelehrt hast. Du bist ja der Allwissende und Allweise.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ لَا عِلۡمَ لَنَآ إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمۡتَنَآۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥānaka lā ʿil'ma lanā illā mā ʿallamtanā innaka anta al-ʿalīmu al-ḥakīmu
